DASHBOARD.Powerful Inclusive Full Stack Blockchain: Powerful Inclusive Full Stack Blockchain-Platform-As-a-Service for Enterprises.

ABOUT.description1: Simplifies and expedites blockchain application development, gives you the flexibility to choose between available programming languages and blockchain runtimes that better suit your needs.
ABOUT.description2: You receive unparalleled benefits from an integrated collaborative development environment, workspace management, version control repository and many preconfigured tasks.
ABOUT.description3: Let our platform do the heavy lifting while you focus on value-adding work such as application creation and experimenting with the blockchain technologies at a fraction of the cost and time.

PROBLEM.description1: Enterprises have difficulties selecting which blockchain technology to use. For example, Bitcoin blockchain is more suited for transfer of currencies.
PROBLEM.description2: Companies have difficulties understanding the use cases that apply to their industry and knowing how to evaluate the return on investment.
PROBLEM.description3: Piecing together the blockchain nodes, storage, cloud development environment and github requires a lot of effort. It is time-consuming and resources intensive, thus excluding most companies or startups except those with deep pockets.

SOLUTION.title4: Ready to deploy App (from our app library)
SOLUTION.description1: Experiment with different types of blockchains on 1 platform. Waste no time switching between platforms, applications and providers.
SOLUTION.description2: Solicit new ideas or tools from your community, experts via crowd wisdom. Aggregate innovative solutions in the shortest time possible.
SOLUTION.description3: Scalable, secure and robust enterprise blockchain platform for rapid prototyping and easy production deployment.
SOLUTION.description4: Rapid Prototype to validate use cases atop select pre-deployed application from our ready to deploy blockchain applications. This reduces the time and costs to create a fail fast and safe environment.

ADVANTAGE.description1: Clients will be investing in a platform which is highly scalable in the cloud solution.
ADVANTAGE.description2: Quickly build and validate blockchain use cases atop select pre-deployed blockchain application. This shortens the time and lowers the costs to create a fail fast and safe environment.
ADVANTAGE.description3: Our idea and founder has been accepted into SGInnovate, Singapore Government’s hand picked startups. Staffed by the most skilled engineers and award winning team.
ADVANTAGE.description4: We stand by the quality of our products and services. We are committed to providing you with value and no unreasonable charges. Inclusion and Blockchain is our mantra.
ADVANTAGE.description5: Our team is cross-functional and experienced in the business of blockchain with varied backgrounds

PLATFORM.text: Morpheus Labs BPaaS simplifies and expedites your blockchain application development and gives you the flexibility to choose between available programming languages and blockchain runtimes that better suit your needs. You get unparalleled benefits from an integrated collaborative development environment, workspace management, version control repository and many preconfigured tasks. Let our platform do the heavy lifting while you focus on value-adding work like application creation and experiment with the blockchain technologies at a fraction of the cost and time.

WHY US.text1: Infrastructure is critical in all functioning, robust first world economies. However, in the current blockchain state of affairs, proper infrastructure is sorely lacking.
WHY US.text2: Morpheus Labs will fill this void by building a revolutionary platform that focuses on quick go-to-market strategies, and user friendliness. We empower enterprises and individuals to perform rapid prototyping and validation of business ideas at low cost.

BENEFIT.summary: Morpheus Infrastructure Token (MITx) is designed to be used within the Morpheus BPaaS network for all services and products rendered, platform subscription, distributorship licensing and token swaps with other digital currencies or tokens.
BENEFIT.listtext2: Payment for different tiers of services
BENEFIT.listtext3:
Download to use wide range of applications in our app store with exclusive benefits.
Download to customise or engage the application owner to customise for you
BENEFIT.listtext4:
Financial settlement for various tiers of licensing
Resources support and sharing
BENEFIT.listtext5:
Token swap among apps within the network
Traded on Cryptocurrency exchange
BENEFIT.detail1: The primary use of the token is for both platform subscription and application-related usage, whereby users can use these tokens to procure any services within the platform network, and pay service providers within it. Users can switch among different subscription tiers with full flexibility. Upgrades are featured for applications that are chosen.
BENEFIT.detail2: As more blockchain applications are curated on our app store, MITx will also allow convertibility to discount coupons for other ICOs within our network. This will translate into cost savings and promotional items in other applications.
BENEFIT.detail3: Financial settlement and resources support between licensees and licensors, where distributorship could be easily managed, facilitates critical real-time support for any distributors or sub-distributors in any corner of the world. Easy token swapping among our app stores will also permit savings on transactional fees and more effective portfolio management for individual and corporate investors.
BENEFIT.detail4: MITx will be traded on crypto exchanges and this offers token holders the flexibility to trade and liquidate their holdings, if they so choose. They will be able to convert to fiat currency or swap to other cryptocurrencies. Holders can capitalise on trading opportunities and maximise value appreciation of their tokens.
BENEFIT.cardtext1: Payment for different tiers of services
BENEFIT.cardtext2: Download to use wide range of applications in our app store with exclusive benefits. Download to customise or engage the application owner to customise for you
BENEFIT.cardtext3: Financial settlement for various tiers of licensing. Resources support and sharing
BENEFIT.cardtext4: Token swap among apps within the network. Traded on Cryptocurrency exchange

ROADMAP.tech-desc0: Develop Alpha version of Morpheus Labs BPaaS platform which is focused on the implementation of Platform Presentation Layer.
ROADMAP.tech-desc1: MVP with user interface (UI) and technology enhancements based on feedback from usage of Version Alpha. Deploy basic DevOps tooling, which aims to facilitate rapid development of blockchain applications and rapid prototyping.
ROADMAP.tech-desc2: Enhancements of DevOps tooling to support co-working and group development. We will enable microservice–based blockchain application development and allow exposure of the application services as APIs. Multichain is supported in this phase.
ROADMAP.tech-desc3: Enable users to manage their monthly usage of the platform, hence permitting the commercialisation of our service.
ROADMAP.tech-desc4: Building a new set of capabilities to empower and encourage our users to try different blockchains and find the most suitable for their product by evaluating different features of different blockchains using our platform.
ROADMAP.biz-desc0: Idea and founder was hand-picked by SGInnovate (a Government initiative)
biz-desc1: Founding advisory team joined in August.
Top 5 (out of global 22 bidders) in Smart Dubai Government.
biz-desc2: In final discussion of a 5-campus Government Polytechnic to co create a curriculum.
Signed MoU with Proline Integrated Intelligence (one of biggest System integrators) on Turkey smart nation projects (Starts with airport).
Received proposal for distributorship and JV in Japan, Malaysia and Dubai.
biz-desc3: Collaboration with Y3 technology on building tracking PoC
Official sales partnership campaign for Southeast Asia region.
biz-desc4: Official sales partnership campaign for rest of Asia and UAE region.
Launch blockchain lab across Southeast Asia in all established and recognised innovation labs, accelerators, co-working spaces, colleges and universities.
biz-desc5: Launch blockchain lab across rest of Asia and UAE in innovation labs, accelerators, co-working spaces, college and universities.
Sales activities launch in rest of Asia and UAE.

GENERATION.summary: A total of 1 Billion MITx will be minted. 250 million MITx will be issued to the public in this Token Generation Event. The release of the 250 million MITx is to generate sufficient funding for us and to hold us accountable for the funds. The remaining MITx will be used for business expansions and will only be released for sales according to the product roadmap. All proceeds generated from these events will be used only for product and business development.
GENERATION.note-1: Please note, the full address can be found in our email to you.
GENERATION.note-emp: If you did not receive the email but have whitelisted yourself, please send us an email immediately at
GENERATION.foot-1: The number of tokens issued per unit ETH,
GENERATION.foot-emp: will be pegged when the individual phases start based on the actual ETH price
GENERATION.foot-3: . Once the cap of 31,250 ETH (equivalent to USD 25M amount) is reached, the TGE will be closed. Our token will be listed in exchanges upon token events closed, irregardless of the final amount raised. We will be announcing these exchanges in time to come.

TEAM.member-bg0: B. Info system (University of Melbourne, Australia); Finance Tech (Massachusetts Institute of Technology).
TEAM.member-exp0: Serial entrepreneur, raised multi-million funding & grew one of his startups to a million dollar generating business. His BPaaS was picked by SGInnovate (gov) as the pioneer batch of incubatees.
TEAM.member-bg1: B.Comp Eng (Nanyang Technology University, Singapore); Finance Tech (Massachusetts Institute of Technology)
TEAM.member-exp1: Ex-Co member of Singapore Fintech Association heading the Talent Committee, an active speaker for Blockchain events & consultant for corps & gov, he worked with C-Suite Exe on various strategic partnerships.
TEAM.member-bg2: B. Physics (University Of Bucharest). MBA(University of Liverpool). Member of Institute of International Finance
TEAM.member-exp2: Over 16 years in Financial Services Application Development & IT Management, seasoned in multi-million digital transformation projects. Group CIO at UniCredit Bank; Tech Advisor in blockchain, IoT & FinTech startups.
TEAM.member-bg3: B.Applied Mathematics (Tianjin University), EMBA (Rutgers Business School), Finance Tech (Massachusetts Institute of Technology)
TEAM.member-exp3: Over 20 years in software development and tech innovation. Implemented a blockchain business application in production using HyperLedger Fabric V1.0, the first in the world.
TEAM.member-bg4: Master’s Degree in ICMA at Reading University in 2006
TEAM.member-exp4: An active Blockchain Blogger in China with 10 years of international banking experience as higher management across Asia. Led dozens projects including cross-border payment solution with Alibaba.
TEAM.member-bg5: B.Multimedia Design (The One Academy of Malaysia)
TEAM.member-exp5: Over 10 years of specialised in strategy & design. He creates better user interface & user experience in design to generate better marketing & sales to the global banking clients.
TEAM.member-bg6: B.Info System Tech & Design (Singapore University of technology and Design, Singapore)
TEAM.member-exp6: Delivered multiple applications for big clients from financial institutions & banks. A full stack developer & a advocate of Agile Development; a Blockchain Enthusiast.
TEAM.member-bg7: B.Info System (National University of Singapore, Singapore)
TEAM.member-exp7: Senior full stack developer (UX) with experience in delivering multi-million applications with global clients from banking, retail and manufacturing; a Blockchain Enthusiast.
TEAM.member-bg8: Zhejiang Yuexiu University of Foreign Languages
TEAM.member-exp8: With extensive experience in English - Chinese translation, and season in community building, technical news & article write up. A blockchain Enthusiast with excellent PR & marketing skills.
TEAM.member-bg9: M. Professional Accounting, Brisbane, Queensland University of Technology; B.Comms., Public Relations, Melbourne, RMIT University
TEAM.member-exp9:
Hanna is fluent in both the language of business and communications. She has had great experience in online marketing and public relations. 
 Her most recent experience in management consulting and accounting has equipped her to be better understanding of business operations and numbers. She’s a huge believer of blockchain technology and thinks that this will change the future for the better.
TEAM.advisor-bg0: Chair Professor of Internet Finance (Nanking University: EMBA); Lecturer (Capital University of Economics and Business & China University of Political Science and Law)
TEAM.advisor-exp0: Founder of Top Fund Blockchain capital and advisor to Ant Finance (Alibaba), he is selected 2017 <Forbes> China top 30 under 30 Elite list and one of top blockchain influencers in China.
TEAM.advisor-bg1: B.Law (Peking University); Mst.Law (University of London); CPEC & PCLL (University of Hong Kong); Adjunct Lecturer (Curtin University, Nottingham Trent University, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University); Founding partner of Acme Ardent
TEAM.advisor-exp1: An international lawyer, advised more than 10 ICO projects globally in law, advising & reviewing blockchain regulations in various jurisdictions. With vast Chinese investor network, he is one of most sought after ICO advisors in North Asia.
TEAM.advisor-bg2: Mst. Science (Distinc - University of Leeds). DBA (University of South Australia). Partner, Invention Capital. Vice-Chairman, BANSEA
TEAM.advisor-exp2: Co-founder of BANSEA Fund One, where served as the Chair in its Investment Committee Board. The co-inventor of IP Blockchain, has over 20 IT related patents and thousands of inventions.
TEAM.advisor-bg3: Mst of Law (University of Cambridge). E/MBA (INSEAD & Tsinghua), Founding president: Assoc of Intellectual Property Entrepreneurs and Organisations (AIPO) & treasurer of Malaysian Business Angel Network (MBAN).
TEAM.advisor-exp3: Founder director of Global IP Southeast Asia Pte Ltd, owns IP rights consultancy firm with offices across Asia. Actively involved in venture/angel capital investment in IP startups.
TEAM.advisor-bg4: PhD.Mech Eng (Glasgow University). MBA Scholar (University at Buffalo). Research scholar (Committee of Vice Chancellors & Principals). Assoc prof (Hon. & Adjunct of National University of Singapore)
TEAM.advisor-exp4: A conference speaker & seasoned entrepreneur; founded several successful companies including a multi-million financial tech company which was acquired. He held IP related key positions at government bodies.
TEAM.advisor-bg5: MBA & PhD (Psychology) (University of California); Founder/Chairman (Excitron partners/Excitron Inc)
TEAM.advisor-exp5: Active Blockchain influencer and Keynote Speaker. He was the lead M&A negotiator between DEC & Compaq; and China Mobile & Ericsson. With vast investment network across globe and managing over $2B fundings.
TEAM.advisor-bg6: B. Econ & Political Science (National University of Singapore) MBA - Investment (Hull Business School)
TEAM.advisor-exp6: Experience in helping startups raise fundings, with 6 years at a local university incubator, helped created 80 startups & advised over 500 founders in business strategies. Active in blockchain & crypto space.
TEAM.advisor-bg7: B.BA (The university of Texas, Austin); M. Finance (Science Po; Paris)
TEAM.advisor-exp7: Worked on roughly 25 ICOs actively raising over $150 million. Specialised in marketing for high-growth tech and blockchain startups, including a leading Asian VC firm and executing go-to-market strategies for early-stage projects.
TEAM.advisor-bg8: Ph.D. Finance (LeBow School of Business - Drexel University); Finance Tech (Massachusetts Institute of Technology)
TEAM.advisor-exp8: A professor & Independent Director for Nanoplus, Inc., expert in finance, investment, corporate governance and robotic trading. He worked closely with Ministry of Science & Technology (Taiwan) for years.
TEAM.advisor-bg9: PHD.Electrical & Comp Eng (Georgia Institute of Technology). National Science Scholarship, 8 patents and more than 50 research papers published.
TEAM.advisor-exp9: A research program manager in A*STAR, managed more than $10million in research grants. Appointed by Singapore government to lead & develop standards for nationwide fiber network.

FOOTER.legal-2: Investing in ICOs and digital tokens can be very rewarding, but it involves a number of risks and challenges. If you choose to invest,  you need to be aware of and accept three important considerations, 1. illiquidity , 2.Diversification, 3.Loss of Capital. This list of risk factors does not purport to be a complete enumeration or explanation of the risks. Prospective investors should review, at the very least, but not limited to, the whitepaper, team and also product roadmap in their entirety and consult with their own advisers before making any decision to invest.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
FAQ.Q2: 어디서 영문버전 백서를 다운받을 수 있나요?
FAQ.Q6: 팀이 혹시 현재 설립된 블록체인이나 크립토커런시 연합 (Cryptocurrency Associates)과 연관이 있을까요?
FAQ.A6: 네, ACCESS (Singapore Cryptocurrency and Blockchain Industry Association) https://www.access-sg.org 와 SFA (Singapore Fintech Association) https://singaporefintech.org 가 있습니다.
FAQ.A7: 현재 프라이빗 세일 진행중이며 퍼블릭 세일이 시작될 경우 바로 안내 드리겠습니다. 텔레그램, 홈페이지 등을 통해 지켜봐 주세요.
FAQ.Q8: 다음 스테이지는 언제 시작하나요? 토큰세일이 일찍 종료할 가능성이 있나요?
FAQ.A8-2: 지금 현재 진행상황으로 보아, 예상했던 것보다 훨씬 빨리 세일이 종료될 것 같습니다. 세일 참여를 원하시면 화이트리스트 등록해주세요:
FAQ.Q9: MITx토큰 가격이 어떻게 되나요? 그리고 ETH로 계산되나요 아니면 USD로 계산되나요?
FAQ.A9: 세일 진행시의 실제 ETH 시세를 참고합니다.
FAQ.Q10: 보너스 토큰은 언제 받을 수 있고 락 기간은 어떻게 되나요?
FAQ.A10-1: You will receive all your tokens (plus bonuses if applicable) immediately after you have successfully sent in your funds to the wallet address. Private placement phase has a different bonus vesting period as it is processed manually. However, ALL tokens and bonuses will be sent before the end of the token sale event.
FAQ.A10-2: ALL tokens including bonus  will be unlocked after 15th April, 2018.
FAQ.Q11: 토큰 세일 스테이지에 따라 하드캡이 어떻게 분배되어 있나요?
FAQ.Q12: 30% 의 토큰이 커뮤니티를 위해서 예약되었다고 하는데, 그건 무슨뜻인가요?
FAQ.A12: 저희의 비지니스 모델은 B2B와 인프라 허브 입니다. 저희는 소매업자 뿐만이 아닌 유통업체, 제휴업체, 투자업체, 주요 거래소의 상장, 중국지역에서의 마케팅, 이벤트 등을 사용하여 강력한 비지니스 커뮤니티를 구축해야 합니다. 그렇게 사용하기 위한 30%의 토큰입니다.
FAQ.Q13: MITx의 토큰 가격을 방어할 계획이나 전략이 있을까요?
FAQ.A13: 저희의 비즈니스 및 거래에 대한 큰 자신감을 가지고, 우리는 연이익의 10 %를 토큰을 재구매할것이며, 필요한 경우 연간 토큰 발행을 5 %로 제한 할 것입니다
FAQ.Q14: 현재 비지니스가 어느정도 인지 공유 부탁드려요.
FAQ.A14: 현재 우리는 중국, 일본, 말레이시아 및 두바이에 자회사를 설립하고자 하는 제안을 받았습니다. 현재 일본과 말레이시아의 경우 R & D 및 기술 팀을 구성하는 중에 있으며, 2 월 말경 끝날 것이라 예상합니다. 중국의 경우, 큰 시장임을 알고, 리소스를 집중적으로 투자 할 수 있는 전략적 접근 방식을 채택하고 있습니다. 마지막으로, 두바이에 대해서는 여러 이해 관계자들과 협상 중이며, Proline 통합 인텔리전스 (Smart nation-Airport) 및 공급망에 대한 Y3 기술을 사용하여 프로젝트 범위 지정 단계에 있습니다
FAQ.A15: 저희는 MvP에 대한 개선 작업을 수행 중이며, 2 월 중순까지 앱 스토어를 완성하고 2018 년 3 사분기 첫 상용 출시를 목표로하는 로드맵 마일스톤을 계속 진행할 것을 목표로합니다.
FAQ.Q16a: 주요 팀 멤버를 볼 수 있는 비디오가 있을까요?
FAQ.A16a: MorpheusLab 팀은 2018 년 2 월 1 일 동남아시아에서 가장 오래된 엔젤투자 네트워크 인 Business Angel Network BANSEA에서 투구했습니다. Branson (MorpheusLab의 공동 창립자)과 다른 팀 멤버들 (Pei-han, Bruce 및 Dorcel), 그리고 80여 비즈니스 엔젤이 나온, 유튜브 동영상 링크입니다:
FAQ.Q16b: 비디오에 해당하는 슬라이드를 어디서 찾을 수 있을까요?
FAQ.Q17: 팀의 커뮤니티 관리자는 누군지 알려 줄 수 있을까요?
FAQ.A17: 네 저희 관리자는 중국 시장을 담당하는 Clara (clara@morpheuslabs.io) 과 한국 시장을 담당하는 Hanna (hanna@morpheuslabs.io) 가 있습니다. 저희 프로젝트에 관심이 있으신분은 위 관리자분들과 홈페이지, 백서를 참고 부탁드립니다.
FAQ.A19: 프라이빗 세일은 2018년 2월 11일 00시 00분 (GMT+8)에 시작하여 2018년 2월 23일 23시 59분 (GMT+8)에 종료됩니다. 프라이빗은 검증된 투자자들과 62.5 EtH의 최소금액에게만 가능한 세일입니다. 현재 프라이빗 세일 관련하여 지갑 주소를 조별로 이메일 발송 중에 있습니다. 2018년 2월 23일 23시 59분 (GMT+8)까지 보내주셔야 하며, 그 다음 부터는 투자에 대한 자리가 확보되지 못할 가능성이 있으십니다.
FAQ.Q20: 이더를 전송할 지갑 주소가 뭔가요? (앞자리와 뒷자리만 보여드립니다.)
FAQ.A20: 공식 웹사이트 "Token Generation Event (TGE) Structure" 아래에서 확인하실 수 있습니다: https://token.morpheuslabs.io
FAQ.Q21: 텔레그램에서 개인 메세지로 이더 주소를 보내주며 투자금을 보내달라고 합니다. 어떻게 해야 하나요?
FAQ.A21: 언제나 궁금한점이나 의심가는 점이 있으시다면, (a) email token@morpheuslabs.io 로 이메일을 보내셔서 확인을 하시거나 (b) 오피셜 텔레그램 방에서 질문을 해주시길 부탁드립니다. 혹여나 스캠 관련 의혹이 생긴다면 즉각 대응하기 위함임을 알려드립니다.
FAQ.Q22: 락 (Lock) 기간에 대한 기술적 이유가 뭘까요?
FAQ.A22-2: 저희는 투자자들이 토큰을 거래 및 이동 할 수 있기를 원한다는 것을 이해하지만 좋은 거래소에 상장하기 위해서는 많은 요구 사항이 있습니다. 그 중 하나는 토큰이 ERC-20 규격이어야한다는 것입니다. 따라서 저희의 스마트컨트렉트는 ERC-20 표준을 준수하는 방식으로 작성되었습니다. 그러나 그것 또한 토큰의 거래에 몇몇 조건을 부여하는 다른 요소를 포기해야한다는 것을 의미합니다.
FAQ.A22-bullet-1: 투자자는 최대한 빨리 토큰을 거래 및 이동 할 수 있기를 원합니다.
FAQ.A22-bullet-2: 보너스는 ICO 가 완료된 후 약 1 개월 후에 지급됩니다. 저희는 여러 거래소와 협의중이며 시장 조성자는 가격을 안정 시키는데에 노력하려고 합니다.
FAQ.A22-bullet-3: 저희는투자자가 보너스를 제외하고도 수익 구간이 아니면 토큰을 팔지 않을 것이라고 생각합니다.
FAQ.A22-bullet-4: 모든 투자자는 기간내에 토큰을 모두 팔지 않을 것을 락 기간에 대한 명시와 이해를 통해 약속합니다. 이 기간동안 판매가 발견되면 보너스는 취소됩니다.
FAQ.A22-bullet-5: 몰수 된 보너스는 모든 투자자들에게 재분배 될 것입니다.
FAQ.Q23: 언제 MITx 토큰을 지갑간 옮길 수 있을까요?
FAQ.Q24: What stage are you at now (as of 15 Feb 2018)?
FAQ.A24-1: The first batch of our Private Sales has started, running from the 11th Feb 2018 - 00:00 (GMT+8) and end on 16th Feb 2018 - 23:59 (GMT+8). You have to complete your contribution by 16th Feb 2018 - 23:59 (GMT+8), after which your allocation of tokens will not be guaranteed.
FAQ.A24-2: The next batch of the Private Sale will be processed on the 17th Feb 2018 - 00:00 (GMT+8).
FAQ.A24-3: Early Bird Sale is currently scheduled to start on the 24th of February - 00:00(GMT+8). However, as we understand that many investors are waiting for the Early Bird Sale to open up, and there’s a possibility to move the day forward! We’ll definitely notify all of you via Emails and Telegram.
FAQ.A24-4: For those who have submitted Whitelists, we are thoroughly going through them one by one and sending out confirmation emails by batches. In the email, we will state the Sales Stage and the Bonus amount you are invited to participate for.
FAQ.Q25: What is the official Telegram Channel?
